main event: Multiple sightings of unexplained phenomena reported near Camp Hood, Texas between March and May 1949.
interesting points: Sightings included blue-white flashes and blinking lights with varied altitudes and durations., Objects were observed with no previously established identification or reported origins., Sightings were primarily reported by personnel associated with Killeen Base and Camp Hood., Some objects were described as having a diamond shape and brilliant light., The phenomena included various colors and speeds, with some being very slow and others very fast.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects with varying descriptions including lights and flashes
witness description: Reports were made by military personnel from nearby bases.
